typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		trim_pharma as long,
		drug_code as string,
		produit_pharma as string,
		type_drug_code as string,
		famille_produit_pharma as string,
		drug_name_aggregated as string,
		nom_produit_pharma as string,
		conditionnement as string,
		mode_administration as string,
		nom_firme_pharma as string,
		date_debut_rembourse as timestamp,
		statut_produit_pharma as string,
		code_atc as string,
		code_atc_5 as string,
		code_atc_4 as string,
		code_atc_3 as string,
		code_atc_1 as string,
		DDD as double,
		nombre_prises as long,
		orphan_flag as long,
		chapter_IV_bis_flag as long,
		link_same_tablet as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	fileList: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
